title: Out of the Park Baseball 21.1.33 – The ultimate baseball game
content: Out of the Park Baseball 21 – the 21st version of the award-winning sports strategy franchise – delivers the most new features and improvements in series history! title: MacBooster 8.0.3 – Maintains and optimizes your system (release candidate)
content: MacBooster provides a full arsenal of system-maintenance tools to make your Mac run faster.   System Status: Explore the status of your Mac by running a full scan. title: Cosmicast 2.0.4 – Beautiful podcast player
content: Cosmicast is a beautiful podcast player built with design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can pick it up and get started immediately. This is made even faster with OPML podcast importing, so you can start using the gorgeous turntable right away.   Key features: Beautiful interface […]

title: Tune Sweeper 4.25 – Remove iTunes duplicates and fix track data
content: Tune Sweeper is a powerful tool for cleaning your iTunes library. It makes finding and removing duplicate tracks from your iTunes library a breeze. Tune Sweeper can also be used to download missing track information and artwork to your tracks.   Tune Sweeper searches your iTunes library for groups of duplicate tracks based upon the […]

title: SonicWeb Internet Radio Player 2.5 – Internet radio player and recorder
content: SonicWeb is an advanced multi-radio recording internet radio player. It plays free internet radio stations, records, and automatically splits the recorded streams into separate tracks and adds them to playlists. It supports the creation of custom playlists and allows the export of tracks to iTunes and into files.   Check out the demonstration video to […]

title: Bad North 2.00.5 – Defend your idyllic island kingdom against a horde of Viking invaders
content: Bad North is a charming but brutal real-time tactics roguelite. Defend your idyllic island kingdom against a horde of Viking invaders, as you lead the desperate exodus of your people. Command your loyal subjects to take full tactical advantage of the unique shape of each island.   Real-time tactics roguelite: Position and relocate your troops […]

title: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters 1.06 – Horror, Action & Adventure
content: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters is an atmospheric, story-driven game. title: Haptic Touch Bar 2.4.0 – Tactile and sound feedback for your MacBook Pro Touch Bar
content: Haptic Touch Bar provides actual feedback when pressing buttons on your Touch Bar Brings back the full Escape key experience! title: Easy Markdown 1.8.1 – Create Web pages using markdown
content: Easy Markdown lets you create Web pages just writing plain text. title: Ultra Character Map 2.1.1 – Access any character or glyph in any font
content: Ultra Character Map lets you access any character or glyph in any font and use it in other apps. It also lets you do side-by-side font comparisons, print font catalogs, view detailed character and font information (including the keystroke combinations that produce special or accented characters), and much more.   Features Unlock everything your fonts […]
